section.para: To view Work Order history by Class Code, select the "Work Order History by Class Code" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Work Order History by Class Code

note.para: Work Order Materials and Operations history is saved in the database after a Work Order is closed. Reports can be written to retrieve this information.

section.para: When displaying Work Order history by Class Code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Work Order history for all Class Codes.
Specify Class Code whose Work Order history you want to display.
Enter a Class Code pattern to select a range of Class Codes.
Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in Pattern Matching with Regular Expressions"Topic: Pattern Matching with Regular Expressions".
Select to display Work Order history by Class Code for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose Work Order history by Class Code you want to display.

varlistentry.term: Only Show Top Level Work Orders

listitem.para: Select to display only top level Work Orders.
Top level Work Orders are Work Orders that have not been created to meet the component demands of a parent Work Order.
Select to show Work Order Cost in the display.
Display lists Work Order history by Class Code, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
